title: Stencil
content:
Can anyone recommend and nice stencil fount with a lower case alphabet?   
   
I think probally san serif with a strong graphic look.
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content: Probably my favorite stencils right now are [Alexey](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127115313/http:/www.thirstype.com/font_alexey.html) by Thirstype, and Robocop by [Apollo 26](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127115313/http:/apollo26.com/).

Rian Hughes' [Paralucent Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127115313/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=DET0000192) is one of my favourites. And the stencil weight of [Granite](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127115313/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ALT0000107) by Gareth Hague has some wonderful details in it.

A few more, at ' [Stencil Revolution](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127115313/http:/www.stencilrevolution.com/resources/)'..   
 [www.stencilrevolution.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127115313/http:/www.stencilrevolution.com/)   
   
_( 'Gunplay', by Ray Larabie, maybe.. Just in case you are seeking a free one.. )_

Funny stuff, David. I was just going to link to that site. One of my favourite sites.   
stnclrvltn   
   
Beside those at stnclrvltn there are also the fonts AG Book Stencil or Glaser Stencil. they are nice.   
   
magnus
